Posts.Content: hi there ---i have just had this operation in june ---- i do not have the brca gene but my identical twin died 4 years ago this operation was a precautionary measure to reduce the amount of oestrogen produced ---- i would very strongly recommend this --prior to the op i was on arimidex and zoladex injections to turn the ovaries off --since the op --which was keyhole i am on arimidex only and feeling really good ---menopause symptoms are minimal any advice you want just let me know   this is a long hard road we undertake but there is light at the end and you have to stay positive   love kate
Posts.Title: Brca1 gene
